product.shortDescription: Tough, yet striking our 11.84 lbs. aluminum carry-on comes fully equipped with familiar features you’ve come to love. Including 360° degree spinner wheels for effortless travel and TSA-approved locks. Over time, aluminum luggage is prone to scuffs and dents, giving it more character with every journey.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.headlineDescription:
Tough, yet striking our 11.84 lbs. aluminum carry-on comes fully equipped with familiar features you’ve come to love. Including 360°degree spinner wheels for effortless travel and TSA-approved locks.

  • Overall Dimensions: 20 in. x 15.7 in. x 9.1 in.
  • Weight: 11.84 lbs.
